website_summaries.verdict: A wireless charging pad with a cool, futuristic design.
pros: Reviews rave about the everyday use of this charger
Works well in preventing lost power in day to day water-related mishaps
Anti-slip rubber base keeps device from slipping
cons: Can be a little slow to fully charge

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: slim, lightweight, portable, I like how the cable is attached to the unit. Cons: not fast charging, build is good but could be better, died after 4 months. I compared it to the first Samsung wireless charging pad I have and they both charged about the same, and my Samsung wireless charger is before fast charging. But one day it just died I don't know why I keep it next to my desk and never move it. Update: I received a replacement from the support team appears that I had a defective one, this one is so far working great.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Flores

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy charge
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, and makes my life a whole lot easier. I use it on the boat for charging my phone. The charge is quick and the disc is a nice size, not to big.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Princess

customer_reviews.title: great wireless charger
customer_reviews.text: My Note 5 decided to stop charging through the port last night, so I needed to pick something up today to get me through while I decided about getting it fixed. This is the only one that delivered on all points it promised - fast charging and no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: It works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for the office and it works very well. It charges fast and won't overheat your phone. Just FYI, it works only with Iphones. I tried it with my wife's Samsung but it wouldn't charge it. I also like that it's water proof b/c I spill water or coffee on my desk weekly :( All in all, I'm very happy with this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: I am really glad to have found a great solution for a cheaper ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many usb chargers but non seem to last. I even wrap them with tape in hopes to get them last longer but to no avail. I am really glad to have found a great solution for a cheaper price and subsequently save me money in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Great low profile fast charger!
customer_reviews.text: I like the slim profile of this charger, the light is less bright than others I've used so it's less obtrusive at night. Having a fixed cable is the only real con, but it allows the unit to be waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: JoeR

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully and has a small green light on the front ...
customer_reviews.text: The cubevit waterproof fast charger is a lightweight fast wireless charging device. It works wonderfully and has a small green light on the front of it to notify you that an item is indeed charging. Highly recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth LaFleur

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and works great!  Just have to be sure the correct side is facing upwards.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it yesterday. It worked great last night and today. Earlier today, I had had some trouble with it, tried different outlets, AC/USB adapters, and it still didn't work. It turns out, I had flipped the disc and was trying to charge when it was upside down (right side up and upside down look very similar - same shape). When upside down, it won't charge at all. But when upside up, it works GREAT! Very easy!
customer_reviews.author: doge

customer_reviews.title: I have a very thin, non-metallic case and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a very thin, non-metallic case and the charger works about 50% of the time with it. Certainly more convenient to use, but I still plug it in if I know I'm going to need a fully charged phone in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Brad R. Naegle

customer_reviews.title: Like others said Junk
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews of people complaining it stopped working within one or two days.. I thought I was different so still went ahead and bought it.. well less then 24hrs it charges for 2 to 3 seconds then it stops... cover no cover, tried every single angle.. it’s useless within 24hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR IT IS NOT CHARGING FAST AT ALL, RETURNING IT,
customer_reviews.author: roxy

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It charges my iPhone X fast
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, I like it. It charges my iPhone X fast, and I like the feel of the product. It doesn't feel cheaply made, and has a nice weight to it. It also doesn't get that hot while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Chang

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product gets very hot after 30 mins or more charging time. My otter case now has a burnt round mark
customer_reviews.author: Safdar Ali

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective alternative to charge Galaxy Edge 7
customer_reviews.text: The device works good and is pretty simple. I recently purchased a car charger for my Galaxy Edge 7, but needed a wireless charger for my home. The part of my phone where the wire usually connects to had broken so I'm grateful for this alternative way to charge my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Santos Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is waterproof yet. Sometimes its hard to make the connection but could be the case I have the phone in. Other then that it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: It Charges!
customer_reviews.text: It charges as expected, no complaints. I have not tried the waterproof part of it yet...more to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wireless charger I bought. It works perfectly. Used primarily on an iPhone X. This wireless charger is a fantastic product for the price. I put the phone on it every night - you do need to place it on the "sweet spot" and the phone also indicates that a charge has begun. In the morning, all I do is pick up the phone and go. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not to good
customer_reviews.text: It’s good product but it charge show when I purchase it shows fast charging but it doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: Mirza Naser Baig

customer_reviews.title: Failed product Way less than a year!!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new Galaxy s9+ / charger has already quit charging, greeen light blinks all day and night. I noticed issue a little over 1.5 months ago,unplugged few a few days to see if it would rest! Did not work! Purchased may 2018 and already failed!!!
customer_reviews.author: BRYANT ARMSTRONG

customer_reviews.title: I find this super convenient when it’s late or dark and I don’t ...
customer_reviews.text: I find this super convenient when it’s late or dark and I don’t want to struggle with plugging in. I dislike that it doesn’t work with thick cases, which I have, but it doesn’t take much effort to slip my silicon case on and off real quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Kuzma

customer_reviews.title: Not good with case on phone.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to get the phone to charge even with a thin case.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Raney

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, just use your regular charger this doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this. First of all it doesn’t charge fast, second it’s not reliable it spends the whole time connecting and disconnecting so your phone never really charges. Just use the power cord sent with your phone and don’t bother with this. It’s a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy! No set up required!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! You just set your phone on top of it and charge away!! I can even leave my case on! It was very simple and there was no need to set anything up. I was able to just plug it in and it worked right away.
customer_reviews.author: Erin F.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money. Product is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: the PRODUCT only worked about two times before no longer functioning..
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works but it’s not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s my case but it seems to work well for the kids phones but not mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McG

customer_reviews.title: Don't take the charging position
customer_reviews.text: I have to move and move until it start charging
customer_reviews.author: Robert Velez

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says it is, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This charger says fast charging but actually it's slow as f@#$ I had my note 8 on it for 3 hours and only got to 63% and yes i had the fast charging wall adapter to it
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vandervoort

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use charged even with case on but didn't last more then 1 to 2 months and quit working
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Box and instructions say keep away from water.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing in the box or on the box says water resistant. We will see what happens...
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Takes about an hour for 10% my phones new so cannot be my battery
customer_reviews.author: mario cortez

customer_reviews.title: Worst charger ever
customer_reviews.text: It only charged sometimes and then it stopped completely . I had to go buy another charger
customer_reviews.author: valencia jones

customer_reviews.title: He loved it and said it worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift to my father! He loved it and said it worked perfectly. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Never worked properly !!!!
customer_reviews.text: It had a shortage in it first time I used it unfortunately I had it 30 days before I opened so it’s to late to return!!!
customer_reviews.author: D Marie

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This item is horrible!! I have been trying to use it the past 2 weeks and it never charges my phone!! Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: It works well!!! I’ve been using it ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well!!! I’ve been using it for weeks. It charges my phone very fast. You definitely should buy one if you have a iphoneX.
customer_reviews.author: Yufei Chen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: When I put my phone down on this it charges for about 5 seconds and then stops.
customer_reviews.author: Anah C.

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: It is great! Works perfectly. A little bit heavy but it can charge two devices at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: jyoti

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Galaxy phone!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 18 year old son. My son has a Galaxy phone. This charged my son’s phone very fast. It was faster than if he had plugged it in with his regular phone charger. I bought this for him because sometimes the charger insertion on his phone is dysfunctional. This really helps to remedy this problem. We did not test the waterproof part. And I hope my son doesn’t get the charger or his phone set but he is a teenage boy so it’s a nice prevention strategy just in case. The packaging protects the charger and cord in shipping so everything comes in top shape.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Overall great quality. While one may not forsee spilling something ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall great quality. While one may not forsee spilling something on their charger, if this is on a night stand or a desk then someone could easily knock over a drink and get liquid on the charger. So the waterproof feature is nice even if you do not anticipate using it. I hope more devices support wireless charging in the near future. I've worn out many charging ports and chargers over the years. This makes it nice to be able to easily charge a device and yet it's easy to just grab and go when you need it without having to disconnect or forgetting the phone is plugged in!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: It lasted exactly 8 week, then died. Strictly speaking, I could have qualified for the 60 day replacement policy mentioned on the product page, but I didn't keep the company contact information. If this is how its going to go, however, I'll try a different product. Update 8-14-2018. I bumped it up a star. The company actually contacted me after I posted the first review, and offered to send me a replacement unit which just arrived. We'll see how long it lasts, but very good customer service, in any case.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Sliw charge
customer_reviews.text: Works but charges super slow. I ordered this charger because when my child gets ahold of my galaxy s8 and it says I cant plug it in and it wont charge this charges it til it dries but it's just so slow
customer_reviews.author: MaKaela

customer_reviews.title: I love the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging, and it is easy to carry around. It is about a size of an average novel, a little even smaller. I was a little hesitant to try dumping it into water (just my cautious personality), but I sprinkled with water, and it was fine! I love the color, and simplicity of the design. It charges well, and I didn't really find any errors or problems with it. The best part I have to say is the light weight that allows me to carry it to work.
customer_reviews.author: 2017 Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice charging pad, but doesn't reliably work charge phones in cases
customer_reviews.text: This is a good charging pad, except it doesn't always charge the phone continuously if it is in a case. I have attempted to charge this overnight but was unable to get a full charge while I had the case on it. I then tried to do this without the case, and it worked perfectly. That is my only "ding" for this product as I don't want to have to take off the case every time I charge it.
customer_reviews.author: william baker

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I leave it on the kitchen counter ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! I leave it on the kitchen counter so it’s super convienent to just set it down! Especially when I’m cooking and trying to get things done. I need to have one for every room. Great purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Melisa V.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, nice design, great overall.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sweet charger. It works like a charm. I have it sitting on my night stand and I just put the cellphone on it when I go to bed. Cellphone is charged by morning. Works with any regular USB power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Ion Caza

customer_reviews.title: Love the Design!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look to this charger! Smooth, sleek, black. I haven't tested the "waterproofness" because I'm too scared, but It's good to know incase I spill water on it in the future. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Janie G

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims to do. No complaints. ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it claims to do. No complaints. Haven't fully tested it's waterproof capability but it's the one kept near the pool just in case :)
customer_reviews.author: Darkbull

customer_reviews.title: I really tried to like this. Been using with my iPhone 8 Plus
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to like this. Been using with my iPhone 8 Plus. Kept searching for sweet spot. Kept making noise and flashing all night long two nights in a row. It has to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works through pop sockets and works well!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome qi charger! Bought it for my wife who just got an iPhone 10 and she loves it! The most amazing thing is that it works THROUGH her pop socket (that thing a lot of people are putting on their phone that pops out for better grip) I was worried it wouldn’t be able to charge through that but it did! I recepmmend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works. Not that fast and stops and starts for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works. Not that fast and stops and starts for no apparent reason. Haven’t used it a lot but it did charge phone with otter box commuter on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Smith

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure how useful the waterproof feature will be
customer_reviews.text: This charger is very fast. It charges my phone in half the time it takes my other wireless chargers. I'm not sure how useful the waterproof feature will be, unless I spill a drink on my desk...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in one day
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Worked once, then completely stopped with or without standard silicon Apple branded iPhone X case.
customer_reviews.author: OP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay charging!
customer_reviews.text: The charger shows charging when you put it on but doesn't seem to stay that way! Need to go return but missed my return by date! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Charges like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I like that it works when I set my phone down! Good choice in charges
customer_reviews.author: IloveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little charger. Small. Easy to pack and works well and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! Charges my devices quickly and very convenient!!! Recommend highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use, it's easy to charge, and it's easy to carry. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: zhanzi gao

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have already it. It very nice. The charger is light and wafery. It is charging so fast
customer_reviews.author: ZwlDarren
